Text: What's the SOURCE? Normally this is stated above in the nfo. I assume it's SHOWTiME, but people shouldn't have to assume.

It's not really watchable, the audio is pretty bad. I tried playing with the equalizer on VLC and could adjust it some, but not enough to make the movie enjoyable.

I appreciate the effort though!
